description.ko: 행성의 원초적이고 거친 질감을 가로지르는 몰입형 시각적 여정으로, 천상의 관점에서 본 침식과 성장 사이의 섬세한 균형을 강조합니다.
description.en: An immersive visual journey across the raw and rugged textures of the planet, highlighting the delicate balance between erosion and growth as seen from a celestial perspective.

prompt: Cinematic overhead macro shot of Earth's diverse terrains, transitioning from cracked salt flats to deep emerald rainforest canopies and jagged volcanic basalt, TERRA-1 satellite style, hyper-realistic textures, intricate geological patterns, flowing tectonic aesthetic, 8k resolution, natural lighting.
